elements.name: AC 5 and 6 - Once checked, the Applicant can submit the entire Application and a Success message box should be shown and Upon submission, the main ‘My Grants’ dashboard should show the Application under the ‘Processing’ tab

steps.name: User now at Declare and Acknowledge Terms page
Click on Consent and Acknowledgement checkbox
User navigates to read-only summary page
Click on Consent and Acknowledgement checkbox
